Network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The server is running a listener thread for incoming connections A simulation thread, for updating boids at the clients And callable threads for each connected server

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Server.ClientThread
      Callable thread is created when a client connects.
      class  Server.simulationRunner
      Runs the simulation indefinitely.
